mapper.select: /* slef.xml findCodes */ SELECT GRP_CD, CD, GRP_NM FROM SERVICEINFO_CODE_STANDARD WHERE GRP_CD = #{p} order by CD asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER ( LOAD_DATE ,KPI_STEP ) VALUES ( DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') ,'0' )
mapper.update: UPDATE SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER SET KPI_FORM8_PAY = REPLACE( #{p.KPI_FORM8_PAY}, ',', '' ) ,KPI_FORM9 = #{p.KPI_FORM9} ,KPI_STEP = '7' WHERE KPI_SEQ = #{p.KPI_SEQ} AND END_DATE IS NULL

UPDATE SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER SET KPI_FORM10_PAY = REPLACE( #{p.KPI_FORM10_PAY}, ',', '' ) , KPI_FORM11_PAY = REPLACE( #{p.KPI_FORM11_PAY}, ',', '' ) , KPI_FORM12_PAY = REPLACE( #{p.KPI_FORM12_PAY}, ',', '' ) ,KPI_STEP = '8' WHERE KPI_SEQ = #{p.KPI_SEQ} AND END_DATE IS NULL
UPDATE SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER SET KPI_STEP = '10' ,KPI_AND = 'Y' WHERE KPI_SEQ = #{p.KPI_SEQ} AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL
UPDATE SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER SET KPI_STEP = '0' WHERE KPI_SEQ = #{p.KPI_SEQ} AND END_DATE IS NULL
UPDATE SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER SET KPI_STEP = '1' WHERE KPI_SEQ = #{p.KPI_SEQ} AND END_DATE IS NULL
UPDATE SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER SET KPI_STEP = '2' WHERE KPI_SEQ = #{p.KPI_SEQ} AND END_DATE IS NULL
UPDATE SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER SET KPI_STEP = '3' WHERE KPI_SEQ = #{p.KPI_SEQ} AND END_DATE IS NULL
UPDATE SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER SET KPI_STEP = '4' WHERE KPI_SEQ = #{p.KPI_SEQ} AND END_DATE IS NULL
UPDATE SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER SET KPI_STEP = '5' WHERE KPI_SEQ = #{p.KPI_SEQ} AND END_DATE IS NULL
UPDATE SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER SET KPI_STEP = '6' WHERE KPI_SEQ = #{p.KPI_SEQ} AND END_DATE IS NULL
UPDATE SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER SET KPI_STEP = '7' WHERE KPI_SEQ = #{p.KPI_SEQ} AND END_DATE IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT KPI_SEQ ,COMPANY ,LICENSEE ,CEO_NAME ,BUSINESS_TYPE ,BS_TYPE ,CITY_ZONE ,KPI_FORM1 ,KPI_FORM2 ,KPI_FORM3 ,KPI_FORM4 ,KPI_FORM5 ,KPI_FORM6 ,KPI_FORM7 ,KPI_FORM8 ,KPI_FORM9 ,KPI_FORM10 ,KPI_FORM11 ,KPI_FORM12 ,KPI_FORM13 ,KPI_FORM14 ,KPI_FORM15 ,KPI_FORM3_1 ,KPI_FORM3_3 ,KPI_FORM3_2 ,KPI_FORM6_1 ,KPI_FORM6_2 ,KPI_FORM6_3 ,KPI_FORM13_1 ,KPI_FORM13_2 ,KPI_FORM13_3 ,KPI_FORM13_4 ,KPI_STEP ,LOAD_DATE ,END_DATE ,EVENT_NAME ,EVENT_ADDR ,EVENT_HP ,EVENT_USE FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='0' AND END_DATE IS NULL order by KPI_SEQ desc limit 1

SELECT KPI_SEQ ,COMPANY ,LICENSEE ,CEO_NAME ,BUSINESS_TYPE ,BS_TYPE ,CITY_ZONE ,KPI_FORM1 ,KPI_FORM2 ,KPI_FORM3 ,KPI_FORM4 ,KPI_FORM5 ,KPI_FORM6 ,KPI_FORM7 ,KPI_FORM8 ,KPI_FORM9 ,KPI_FORM10 ,KPI_FORM11 ,KPI_FORM12 ,KPI_FORM13 ,KPI_FORM14 ,KPI_FORM15 ,KPI_FORM3_1 ,KPI_FORM3_3 ,KPI_FORM3_2 ,KPI_FORM6_1 ,KPI_FORM6_2 ,KPI_FORM6_3 ,KPI_FORM13_1 ,KPI_FORM13_2 ,KPI_FORM13_3 ,KPI_FORM13_4 ,KPI_STEP ,LOAD_DATE ,END_DATE FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='1' AND END_DATE IS NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by KPI_SEQ desc limit 1

SELECT KPI_SEQ ,COMPANY ,LICENSEE ,CEO_NAME ,BUSINESS_TYPE ,BS_TYPE ,CITY_ZONE ,KPI_FORM1 ,KPI_FORM2 ,KPI_FORM3 ,KPI_FORM4 ,KPI_FORM5 ,KPI_FORM6 ,KPI_FORM7 ,KPI_FORM8 ,KPI_FORM9 ,KPI_FORM10 ,KPI_FORM11 ,KPI_FORM12 ,KPI_FORM13 ,KPI_FORM14 ,KPI_FORM15 ,KPI_FORM3_1 ,KPI_FORM3_3 ,KPI_FORM3_2 ,KPI_FORM6_1 ,KPI_FORM6_2 ,KPI_FORM6_3 ,KPI_FORM13_1 ,KPI_FORM13_2 ,KPI_FORM13_3 ,KPI_FORM13_4 ,KPI_STEP ,LOAD_DATE ,END_DATE FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='2' AND END_DATE IS NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by KPI_SEQ desc limit 1

SELECT KPI_SEQ ,COMPANY ,LICENSEE ,CEO_NAME ,BUSINESS_TYPE ,BS_TYPE ,CITY_ZONE ,KPI_FORM1 ,KPI_FORM2 ,KPI_FORM3 ,KPI_FORM4 ,KPI_FORM5 ,KPI_FORM6 ,KPI_FORM7 ,KPI_FORM8 ,KPI_FORM9 ,KPI_FORM10 ,KPI_FORM11 ,KPI_FORM12 ,KPI_FORM13 ,KPI_FORM14 ,KPI_FORM15 ,KPI_FORM3_1 ,KPI_FORM3_3 ,KPI_FORM3_2 ,KPI_FORM6_1 ,KPI_FORM6_2 ,KPI_FORM6_3 ,KPI_FORM13_1 ,KPI_FORM13_2 ,KPI_FORM13_3 ,KPI_FORM13_4 ,KPI_STEP ,LOAD_DATE ,END_DATE FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='3' AND END_DATE IS NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by KPI_SEQ desc limit 1

SELECT KPI_SEQ ,COMPANY ,LICENSEE ,CEO_NAME ,BUSINESS_TYPE ,BS_TYPE ,CITY_ZONE ,KPI_FORM1 ,KPI_FORM2 ,KPI_FORM3 ,KPI_FORM4 ,KPI_FORM5 ,KPI_FORM6 ,KPI_FORM7 ,KPI_FORM8 ,KPI_FORM9 ,KPI_FORM10 ,KPI_FORM11 ,KPI_FORM12 ,KPI_FORM13 ,KPI_FORM14 ,KPI_FORM15 ,KPI_FORM3_1 ,KPI_FORM3_3 ,KPI_FORM3_2 ,KPI_FORM6_1 ,KPI_FORM6_2 ,KPI_FORM6_3 ,KPI_FORM13_1 ,KPI_FORM13_2 ,KPI_FORM13_3 ,KPI_FORM13_4 ,KPI_STEP ,LOAD_DATE ,END_DATE FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='4' AND END_DATE IS NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by KPI_SEQ desc limit 1

SELECT KPI_SEQ ,COMPANY ,LICENSEE ,CEO_NAME ,BUSINESS_TYPE ,BS_TYPE ,CITY_ZONE ,KPI_FORM1 ,KPI_FORM2 ,KPI_FORM3 ,KPI_FORM4 ,KPI_FORM5 ,KPI_FORM6 ,KPI_FORM7 ,KPI_FORM8 ,KPI_FORM9 ,KPI_FORM10 ,KPI_FORM11 ,KPI_FORM12 ,KPI_FORM13 ,KPI_FORM14 ,KPI_FORM15 ,KPI_FORM3_1 ,KPI_FORM3_3 ,KPI_FORM3_2 ,KPI_FORM6_1 ,KPI_FORM6_2 ,KPI_FORM6_3 ,KPI_FORM13_1 ,KPI_FORM13_2 ,KPI_FORM13_3 ,KPI_FORM13_4 ,KPI_STEP ,LOAD_DATE ,END_DATE FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='5' AND END_DATE IS NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by KPI_SEQ desc limit 1

SELECT KPI_SEQ ,COMPANY ,LICENSEE ,CEO_NAME ,BUSINESS_TYPE ,BS_TYPE ,CITY_ZONE ,KPI_FORM1 ,KPI_FORM2 ,KPI_FORM3 ,KPI_FORM4 ,KPI_FORM5 ,KPI_FORM6 ,KPI_FORM7 ,KPI_FORM8 ,KPI_FORM8_PAY ,KPI_FORM9 ,KPI_FORM10 ,KPI_FORM11 ,KPI_FORM12 ,KPI_FORM13 ,KPI_FORM14 ,KPI_FORM15 ,KPI_FORM3_1 ,KPI_FORM3_3 ,KPI_FORM3_2 ,KPI_FORM6_1 ,KPI_FORM6_2 ,KPI_FORM6_3 ,KPI_FORM13_1 ,KPI_FORM13_2 ,KPI_FORM13_3 ,KPI_FORM13_4 ,KPI_STEP ,LOAD_DATE ,END_DATE FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='6' AND END_DATE IS NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by KPI_SEQ desc limit 1

select cnt.KPI_SEQ ,cnt.COMPANY ,cnt.LICENSEE ,cnt.CEO_NAME ,cnt.BUSINESS_TYPE ,cnt.BS_TYPE ,cnt.CITY_ZONE ,cnt.KPI_FORM1 ,cnt.KPI_FORM2 ,cnt.KPI_FORM3 ,cnt.KPI_FORM4 ,cnt.KPI_FORM5 ,cnt.KPI_FORM6 ,cnt.KPI_FORM7 ,cnt.KPI_FORM8 ,cnt.KPI_FORM8_PAY ,cnt.KPI_FORM9 ,cnt.KPI_FORM10 ,cnt.KPI_FORM10_PAY ,cnt.KPI_FORM11 ,cnt.KPI_FORM11_PAY ,cnt.KPI_FORM12 ,cnt.KPI_FORM12_PAY ,cnt.KPI_FORM13 ,cnt.KPI_FORM14 ,cnt.KPI_FORM15 ,cnt.KPI_FORM3_1 ,cnt.KPI_FORM3_3 ,cnt.KPI_FORM3_2 ,cnt.KPI_FORM6_1 ,cnt.KPI_FORM6_2 ,cnt.KPI_FORM6_3 ,cnt.KPI_FORM13_1 ,cnt.KPI_FORM13_2 ,cnt.KPI_FORM13_3 ,cnt.KPI_FORM13_4 ,cnt.KPI_STEP ,cnt.LOAD_DATE ,cnt.END_DATE ,(cnt.KPI_FORM11_PAY DIV cnt.KPI_FORM10_PAY) AS hier_num ,KPI_WORK_N ,KPI_PAY_N ,KPI_HERE_N ,KPI_SALES_N ,KPI_BS_N ,(KPI_FORM1+KPI_FORM2+KPI_FORM3+KPI_FORM4+KPI_FORM5+KPI_FORM6+KPI_FORM7+KPI_PAY_N+KPI_FORM9+KPI_HERE_N+KPI_SALES_N+KPI_BS_N+KPI_WORK_N)AS TOTAL_POINT FROM( SELECT KPI_SEQ ,COMPANY ,LICENSEE ,CEO_NAME ,BUSINESS_TYPE ,BS_TYPE ,CITY_ZONE ,KPI_FORM1 ,KPI_FORM2 ,KPI_FORM3 ,KPI_FORM4 ,KPI_FORM5 ,KPI_FORM6 ,KPI_FORM7 ,KPI_FORM8 ,KPI_FORM8_PAY ,KPI_FORM9 ,KPI_FORM10 ,KPI_FORM10_PAY ,KPI_FORM11 ,KPI_FORM11_PAY ,KPI_FORM12 ,KPI_FORM12_PAY ,KPI_FORM13 ,KPI_FORM14 ,KPI_FORM15 ,KPI_FORM3_1 ,KPI_FORM3_3 ,KPI_FORM3_2 ,KPI_FORM6_1 ,KPI_FORM6_2 ,KPI_FORM6_3 ,KPI_FORM13_1 ,KPI_FORM13_2 ,KPI_FORM13_3 ,KPI_FORM13_4 ,KPI_STEP ,LOAD_DATE ,END_DATE ,(KPI_FORM11_PAY DIV KPI_FORM10_PAY) AS hier_num ,(select SERVICE_NUM from social_info_master a, serviceinfo_code_standard b where 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='7' AND END_DATE IS NULL and (b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_WORK_SALES ' and a.BUSINESS_TYPE = b.SERVICE_TYPE) AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by abs(b.SERVICE_STANDARD - (a.KPI_FORM11_PAY DIV a.KPI_FORM10_PAY)) limit 1 ) AS KPI_WORK_N ,(select SERVICE_NUM from social_info_master a, serviceinfo_code_standard b where 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='7' AND END_DATE IS NULL and (b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_PAY' and a.BUSINESS_TYPE = b.SERVICE_TYPE) AND KPI_SEQ =#{p.sequence} order by abs(b.SERVICE_STANDARD - a.KPI_FORM8_PAY) limit 1 ) AS KPI_PAY_N ,(select SERVICE_NUM from social_info_master a, serviceinfo_code_standard b where 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='7' AND END_DATE IS NULL and (b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_HIRE' and a.BUSINESS_TYPE = b.SERVICE_TYPE) AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by abs(b.SERVICE_STANDARD - a.KPI_FORM10_PAY) limit 1 ) AS KPI_HERE_N ,(select SERVICE_NUM from social_info_master a, serviceinfo_code_standard b where 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='7' AND END_DATE IS NULL and (b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_SALES' and a.BUSINESS_TYPE = b.SERVICE_TYPE) AND KPI_SEQ =#{p.sequence} order by abs(b.SERVICE_STANDARD - a.KPI_FORM11_PAY) limit 1 ) AS KPI_SALES_N ,(select SERVICE_NUM from social_info_master a, serviceinfo_code_standard b where 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='7' AND END_DATE IS NULL and (b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_BS_SALES' and a.BUSINESS_TYPE = b.SERVICE_TYPE) AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by abs(b.SERVICE_STANDARD - a.KPI_FORM12_PAY) limit 1 ) AS KPI_BS_N from social_info_master where 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='7' AND END_DATE IS NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by KPI_SEQ desc )cnt

select cnt.KPI_SEQ ,cnt.COMPANY ,cnt.LICENSEE ,cnt.CEO_NAME ,cnt.BUSINESS_TYPE ,cnt.BS_TYPE ,cnt.CITY_ZONE ,cnt.KPI_FORM1 ,cnt.KPI_FORM2 ,cnt.KPI_FORM3 ,cnt.KPI_FORM4 ,cnt.KPI_FORM5 ,cnt.KPI_FORM6 ,cnt.KPI_FORM7 ,cnt.KPI_FORM8 ,cnt.KPI_FORM8_PAY ,cnt.KPI_FORM9 ,cnt.KPI_FORM10 ,cnt.KPI_FORM10_PAY ,cnt.KPI_FORM11 ,cnt.KPI_FORM11_PAY ,cnt.KPI_FORM12 ,cnt.KPI_FORM12_PAY ,cnt.KPI_FORM13 ,cnt.KPI_FORM14 ,cnt.KPI_FORM15 ,cnt.KPI_FORM3_1 ,cnt.KPI_FORM3_3 ,cnt.KPI_FORM3_2 ,cnt.KPI_FORM6_1 ,cnt.KPI_FORM6_2 ,cnt.KPI_FORM6_3 ,cnt.KPI_FORM13_1 ,cnt.KPI_FORM13_2 ,cnt.KPI_FORM13_3 ,cnt.KPI_FORM13_4 ,cnt.KPI_STEP ,cnt.LOAD_DATE ,cnt.END_DATE ,(cnt.KPI_FORM11_PAY DIV cnt.KPI_FORM10_PAY) AS hier_num ,KPI_WORK_N ,KPI_PAY_N ,KPI_HERE_N ,KPI_SALES_N ,KPI_BS_N ,(KPI_FORM1+KPI_FORM2+KPI_FORM3+KPI_FORM4+KPI_FORM5+KPI_FORM6+KPI_FORM7+KPI_PAY_N+KPI_FORM9+KPI_HERE_N+KPI_SALES_N+KPI_BS_N+KPI_WORK_N)AS TOTAL_POINT FROM( SELECT KPI_SEQ ,COMPANY ,LICENSEE ,CEO_NAME ,BUSINESS_TYPE ,BS_TYPE ,CITY_ZONE ,KPI_FORM1 ,KPI_FORM2 ,KPI_FORM3 ,KPI_FORM4 ,KPI_FORM5 ,KPI_FORM6 ,KPI_FORM7 ,KPI_FORM8 ,KPI_FORM8_PAY ,KPI_FORM9 ,KPI_FORM10 ,KPI_FORM10_PAY ,KPI_FORM11 ,KPI_FORM11_PAY ,KPI_FORM12 ,KPI_FORM12_PAY ,KPI_FORM13 ,KPI_FORM14 ,KPI_FORM15 ,KPI_FORM3_1 ,KPI_FORM3_3 ,KPI_FORM3_2 ,KPI_FORM6_1 ,KPI_FORM6_2 ,KPI_FORM6_3 ,KPI_FORM13_1 ,KPI_FORM13_2 ,KPI_FORM13_3 ,KPI_FORM13_4 ,KPI_STEP ,LOAD_DATE ,END_DATE ,(KPI_FORM11_PAY DIV KPI_FORM10_PAY) AS hier_num ,(select SERVICE_NUM from social_info_master a, serviceinfo_code_standard b where 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='8' AND END_DATE IS NULL and (b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_WORK_SALES ' and a.BUSINESS_TYPE = b.SERVICE_TYPE) AND KPI_SEQ =#{p.sequence} order by abs(b.SERVICE_STANDARD - (a.KPI_FORM11_PAY DIV a.KPI_FORM10_PAY)) limit 1 ) AS KPI_WORK_N ,(select SERVICE_NUM from social_info_master a, serviceinfo_code_standard b where 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='8' AND END_DATE IS NULL and (b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_PAY' and a.BUSINESS_TYPE = b.SERVICE_TYPE) AND KPI_SEQ =#{p.sequence} order by abs(b.SERVICE_STANDARD - a.KPI_FORM8_PAY) limit 1 ) AS KPI_PAY_N ,(select SERVICE_NUM from social_info_master a, serviceinfo_code_standard b where 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='8' AND END_DATE IS NULL and (b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_HIRE' and a.BUSINESS_TYPE = b.SERVICE_TYPE) AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by abs(b.SERVICE_STANDARD - a.KPI_FORM10_PAY) limit 1 ) AS KPI_HERE_N ,(select SERVICE_NUM from social_info_master a, serviceinfo_code_standard b where 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='8' AND END_DATE IS NULL and (b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_SALES' and a.BUSINESS_TYPE = b.SERVICE_TYPE) AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by abs(b.SERVICE_STANDARD - a.KPI_FORM11_PAY) limit 1 ) AS KPI_SALES_N ,(select SERVICE_NUM from social_info_master a, serviceinfo_code_standard b where 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='8' AND END_DATE IS NULL and (b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_BS_SALES' and a.BUSINESS_TYPE = b.SERVICE_TYPE) AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by abs(b.SERVICE_STANDARD - a.KPI_FORM12_PAY) limit 1 ) AS KPI_BS_N from social_info_master where 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='8' AND END_DATE IS NULL order by KPI_SEQ desc )cnt where 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='8' AND END_DATE IS NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by KPI_SEQ desc

select cnt.KPI_SEQ ,cnt.COMPANY ,cnt.LICENSEE ,cnt.CEO_NAME ,cnt.BUSINESS_TYPE ,cnt.BS_TYPE ,cnt.CITY_ZONE ,cnt.KPI_FORM1 ,cnt.KPI_FORM2 ,cnt.KPI_FORM3 ,cnt.KPI_FORM4 ,cnt.KPI_FORM5 ,cnt.KPI_FORM6 ,cnt.KPI_FORM7 ,cnt.KPI_FORM8 ,cnt.KPI_FORM8_PAY ,cnt.KPI_FORM9 ,cnt.KPI_FORM10 ,cnt.KPI_FORM10_PAY ,cnt.KPI_FORM11 ,cnt.KPI_FORM11_PAY ,cnt.KPI_FORM12 ,cnt.KPI_FORM12_PAY ,cnt.KPI_FORM13 ,cnt.KPI_FORM14 ,cnt.KPI_FORM15 ,cnt.KPI_FORM3_1 ,cnt.KPI_FORM3_3 ,cnt.KPI_FORM3_2 ,cnt.KPI_FORM6_1 ,cnt.KPI_FORM6_2 ,cnt.KPI_FORM6_3 ,cnt.KPI_FORM13_1 ,cnt.KPI_FORM13_2 ,cnt.KPI_FORM13_3 ,cnt.KPI_FORM13_4 ,cnt.KPI_STEP ,cnt.LOAD_DATE ,cnt.END_DATE ,(cnt.KPI_FORM11_PAY DIV cnt.KPI_FORM10_PAY) AS hier_num ,KPI_WORK_NUM ,KPI_PAY_NUM ,KPI_HERE_NUM ,KPI_SALES_NUM ,KPI_BS_NUM ,KPI_AND ,(KPI_FORM1+KPI_FORM2+KPI_FORM3+KPI_FORM4+KPI_FORM5+KPI_FORM6+KPI_FORM7+KPI_PAY_NUM+KPI_FORM9+KPI_HERE_NUM+KPI_SALES_NUM+KPI_BS_NUM+KPI_WORK_NUM+KPI_FORM13)AS TOTAL_POINT FROM( SELECT KPI_SEQ ,COMPANY ,LICENSEE ,CEO_NAME ,BUSINESS_TYPE ,BS_TYPE ,CITY_ZONE ,KPI_FORM1 ,KPI_FORM2 ,KPI_FORM3 ,KPI_FORM4 ,KPI_FORM5 ,KPI_FORM6 ,KPI_FORM7 ,KPI_FORM8 ,KPI_FORM8_PAY ,KPI_FORM9 ,KPI_FORM10 ,KPI_FORM10_PAY ,KPI_FORM11 ,KPI_FORM11_PAY ,KPI_FORM12 ,KPI_FORM12_PAY ,KPI_FORM13 ,KPI_FORM14 ,KPI_FORM15 ,KPI_FORM3_1 ,KPI_FORM3_3 ,KPI_FORM3_2 ,KPI_FORM6_1 ,KPI_FORM6_2 ,KPI_FORM6_3 ,KPI_FORM13_1 ,KPI_FORM13_2 ,KPI_FORM13_3 ,KPI_FORM13_4 ,KPI_STEP ,LOAD_DATE ,END_DATE ,KPI_AND ,(KPI_FORM11_PAY DIV KPI_FORM10_PAY) AS hier_num ,(select SERVICE_NUM from social_info_master a, serviceinfo_code_standard b where 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL and (b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_WORK_SALES ' and a.BUSINESS_TYPE = b.SERVICE_TYPE) AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by abs(b.SERVICE_STANDARD - (a.KPI_FORM11_PAY DIV a.KPI_FORM10_PAY)) limit 1 ) AS KPI_WORK_NUM ,(select SERVICE_NUM from social_info_master a, serviceinfo_code_standard b where 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL and (b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_PAY' and a.BUSINESS_TYPE = b.SERVICE_TYPE) AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by abs(b.SERVICE_STANDARD - a.KPI_FORM8_PAY) limit 1 ) AS KPI_PAY_NUM ,(select SERVICE_NUM from social_info_master a, serviceinfo_code_standard b where 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL and (b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_HIRE' and a.BUSINESS_TYPE = b.SERVICE_TYPE) AND KPI_SEQ =#{p.sequence} order by abs(b.SERVICE_STANDARD - a.KPI_FORM10_PAY) limit 1 ) AS KPI_HERE_NUM ,(select SERVICE_NUM from social_info_master a, serviceinfo_code_standard b where 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL and (b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_SALES' and a.BUSINESS_TYPE = b.SERVICE_TYPE) AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by abs(b.SERVICE_STANDARD - a.KPI_FORM11_PAY) limit 1 ) AS KPI_SALES_NUM ,(select SERVICE_NUM from social_info_master a, serviceinfo_code_standard b where 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL and (b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_BS_SALES' and a.BUSINESS_TYPE = b.SERVICE_TYPE) AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by abs(b.SERVICE_STANDARD - a.KPI_FORM12_PAY) limit 1 ) AS KPI_BS_NUM from social_info_master where 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL order by KPI_SEQ desc )cnt where 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_AND ='N' AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by KPI_SEQ desc

select GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT cnt.ROW_LIST SEPARATOR ' , ')AS TOP_LIST from( select B.GRP_NM AS ROW_LIST,a.KPI_SEQ,a.END_DATE,a.KPI_AND,a.KPI_STEP from social_info_master a, serviceinfo_code_standard b where 1=1 and( (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM1' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM1 >= b.SERVICE_NUM) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM2' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM2 >= b.SERVICE_NUM) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM3' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM3 >= b.SERVICE_NUM) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM4' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM4 >= b.SERVICE_NUM) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM5' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM5 >= b.SERVICE_NUM) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM6' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM6 >= b.SERVICE_NUM) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM7' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM7 >= b.SERVICE_NUM) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM9' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM9 >= b.SERVICE_NUM) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM13' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM13 >= b.SERVICE_NUM) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM8' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM8 >= b.SERVICE_NUM) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM10' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM10 >= b.SERVICE_NUM) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM11' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM11 >= b.SERVICE_NUM) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM12' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM12 >= b.SERVICE_NUM) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM15' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM15 >= b.SERVICE_NUM) ) AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_AND ='N' AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} )cnt

select GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT cnt.ROW_LIST SEPARATOR ' , ')AS LOW_LIST from( select B.GRP_NM AS ROW_LIST,a.KPI_SEQ,a.END_DATE,a.KPI_AND,a.KPI_STEP from social_info_master a, serviceinfo_code_standard b where 1=1 and( (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM1' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM1 < b.SERVICE_STANDARD ) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM2' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM2 < b.SERVICE_STANDARD ) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM3' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM3 < b.SERVICE_STANDARD ) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM4' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM4 < b.SERVICE_STANDARD) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM5' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM5 < b.SERVICE_STANDARD) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM6' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM6 < b.SERVICE_STANDARD) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM7' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM7 < b.SERVICE_STANDARD) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM9' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM9 < b.SERVICE_STANDARD) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM13' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM13 < b.SERVICE_STANDARD) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM8' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM8 < b.SERVICE_STANDARD) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM10' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM10 < b.SERVICE_STANDARD) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM11' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM11 < b.SERVICE_STANDARD) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM12' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM12 < b.SERVICE_STANDARD) or (b.SERVICE_NM='KPI_FORM15' and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_INFO' and a.KPI_FORM15 < b.SERVICE_STANDARD) ) AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_AND ='N' AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} )cnt

select * from( select * from social_info_master a, serviceinfo_code_standard b where 1=1 and b.GRP_CD ='SERVICE_POINT' AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by abs(b.SERVICE_NUM - a.KPI_TOTAL) limit 1 )cnt where 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by KPI_SEQ desc

SELECT KPI_STEP, COMPANY, (SELECT GRP_NM FROM SERVICEINFO_CODE_STANDARD WHERE GRP_CD = 'SERVICE_CODE' AND CD = BUSINESS_TYPE) AS BUSINESS_TYPE, BS_TYPE, KPI_TOTAL, IFNULL(KPI_TOTAL, "-")KPI_TOTAL_NUM, EVENT_ADDR, EVENT_USE, EVENT_NAME, EVENT_ADDR, EVENT_HP, END_DATE, LOAD_DATE, IFNULL(END_DATE, "-")END_DT, EVENT_ADDR, ( CASE KPI_STEP WHEN 1 THEN '1.회사 기본정보' WHEN 2 THEN '2.사회적 미션의 관리' WHEN 3 THEN '3.주사업활동의 사회적 가치' WHEN 4 THEN '4.사회적경제 생태계 구축노력' WHEN 5 THEN '5.이윤의 사회목적 재투자' WHEN 6 THEN '6.운영의 민주성' WHEN 7 THEN '7.근로자 지향성' WHEN 8 THEN '8.기업활동에서의 혁신성' WHEN 9 THEN '9.고용창출 및 재정성과' ELSE 0 END)KPI_STEP_NM FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE KPI_STEP between '1' and '9' ORDER BY END_DATE DESC

SELECT KPI_STEP, COMPANY, (SELECT GRP_NM FROM SERVICEINFO_CODE_STANDARD WHERE GRP_CD = 'SERVICE_CODE' AND CD = BUSINESS_TYPE) AS BUSINESS_TYPE, BS_TYPE, KPI_TOTAL, LOAD_DATE, EVENT_USE, EVENT_NAME, IFNULL(EVENT_NAME, "-")EVENT_NAME_NM, EVENT_ADDR, IFNULL(EVENT_ADDR, "-")EVENT_ADDR_NM, EVENT_HP, IFNULL(EVENT_HP, "-")EVENT_HP_NM, END_DATE, (CASE KPI_STEP WHEN 1 THEN '1.회사 기본정보' WHEN 2 THEN '2.사회적 미션의 관리' WHEN 3 THEN '3.주사업활동의 사회적 가치' WHEN 4 THEN '4.사회적경제 생태계 구축노력' WHEN 5 THEN '5.이윤의 사회목적 재투자' WHEN 6 THEN '6.운영의 민주성' WHEN 7 THEN '7.근로자 지향성' WHEN 8 THEN '8.기업활동에서의 혁신성' WHEN 9 THEN '9.고용창출 및 재정성과' ELSE 0 END)KPI_STEP_NM FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE KPI_STEP between '1' and '9' AND EVENT_USE ='Y' ORDER BY END_DATE DESC

select STATUS,RESULT from( SELECT TOTAL_STANDAR AS STATUS, TOTAL_AVERAGE AS RESULT FROM social_total_result a, social_info_master b where 1=1 AND TOTAL_CODE ='2' AND TOTAL_TYPE = b.BUSINESS_TYPE AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by KPI_SEQ desc limit 1 )cnt UNION ALL select STATUS,RESULT from( SELECT TOTAL_STANDAR AS STATUS, TOTAL_AVERAGE AS RESULT FROM social_total_result a, social_info_master b where 1=1 AND TOTAL_CODE ='4' AND TOTAL_TYPE = b.BUSINESS_TYPE AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by KPI_SEQ desc limit 1 )cnt UNION ALL select STATUS,RESULT from( SELECT TOTAL_STANDAR AS STATUS, TOTAL_AVERAGE AS RESULT FROM social_total_result a, social_info_master b where 1=1 AND TOTAL_CODE ='6' AND TOTAL_TYPE = b.BUSINESS_TYPE AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by KPI_SEQ desc limit 1 )cnt UNION ALL select STATUS,RESULT from( SELECT TOTAL_STANDAR AS STATUS, TOTAL_AVERAGE AS RESULT FROM social_total_result a, social_info_master b where 1=1 AND TOTAL_CODE ='8' AND TOTAL_TYPE = b.BUSINESS_TYPE AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by KPI_SEQ desc limit 1 )cnt

SELECT TOTAL_STANDAR AS STATUS, TOTAL_AVERAGE AS RESULT FROM social_total_result where 1=1 AND TOTAL_CODE ='1' AND TOTAL_TYPE= '1' UNION ALL SELECT TOTAL_STANDAR AS STATUS, TOTAL_AVERAGE AS RESULT FROM social_total_result where 1=1 AND TOTAL_CODE ='3' AND TOTAL_TYPE= '1' UNION ALL SELECT TOTAL_STANDAR AS STATUS, TOTAL_AVERAGE AS RESULT FROM social_total_result where 1=1 AND TOTAL_CODE ='5' AND TOTAL_TYPE= '1' UNION ALL SELECT TOTAL_STANDAR AS STATUS, TOTAL_AVERAGE AS RESULT FROM social_total_result where 1=1 AND TOTAL_CODE ='7' AND TOTAL_TYPE= '1'

select RESULT from( SELECT truncate(KPI_TOTAL,1) AS RESULT FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by KPI_SEQ desc limit 1 )cnt UNION ALL select RESULT from( SELECT truncate(KPI_FORM1+KPI_FORM2+KPI_FORM3+KPI_FORM4+KPI_FORM5+KPI_FORM6+KPI_FORM7+KPI_FORM8+KPI_FORM9,1) AS RESULT FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by KPI_SEQ desc limit 1 )cnt UNION ALL select RESULT from( SELECT truncate(KPI_FORM10+KPI_FORM11+KPI_FORM12+KPI_FORM15,1) AS RESULT FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by KPI_SEQ desc limit 1 )cnt UNION ALL select RESULT from( SELECT truncate(KPI_FORM13,1) AS RESULT FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by KPI_SEQ desc limit 1 )cnt

select RESULT from( SELECT (KPI_FORM1 * 20) AS RESULT FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by KPI_SEQ desc limit 1 )cnt UNION ALL select RESULT from( SELECT (KPI_FORM2 * 20) AS RESULT FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by KPI_SEQ desc limit 1 )cnt UNION ALL select RESULT from( SELECT truncate(KPI_FORM3 * 10,1) AS RESULT FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by KPI_SEQ desc limit 1 )cnt UNION ALL select RESULT from( SELECT (KPI_FORM4 * 20) AS RESULT FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by KPI_SEQ desc limit 1 )cnt UNION ALL select RESULT from( SELECT (KPI_FORM5 * 20) AS RESULT FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by KPI_SEQ desc limit 1 )cnt UNION ALL select RESULT from( SELECT truncate(KPI_FORM6 * 10,1) AS RESULT FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by KPI_SEQ desc limit 1 )cnt UNION ALL select RESULT from( SELECT (KPI_FORM7 * 20) AS RESULT FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by KPI_SEQ desc limit 1 )cnt UNION ALL select RESULT from( SELECT (KPI_FORM8 * 10) AS RESULT FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by KPI_SEQ desc limit 1 )cnt UNION ALL select RESULT from( SELECT (KPI_FORM9 * 20) AS RESULT FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by KPI_SEQ desc limit 1 )cnt UNION ALL select RESULT from( SELECT ( KPI_FORM10 * 10) AS RESULT FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by KPI_SEQ desc limit 1 )cnt UNION ALL select RESULT from( SELECT (KPI_FORM11 * 10) AS RESULT FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by KPI_SEQ desc limit 1 )cnt UNION ALL select RESULT from( SELECT ( KPI_FORM12 * 20) AS RESULT FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by KPI_SEQ desc limit 1 )cnt UNION ALL select RESULT from( SELECT (KPI_FORM15 * 20) AS RESULT FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by KPI_SEQ desc limit 1 )cnt UNION ALL select RESULT from( SELECT truncate(KPI_FORM13 * 10,1) AS RESULT FROM SOCIAL_INFO_MASTER WHERE 1=1 AND KPI_STEP ='9' AND END_DATE IS NOT NULL AND KPI_SEQ = #{p.sequence} order by KPI_SEQ desc limit 1 )cnt
